biography: Honored Artist of Russia (2006). In 1996 he graduated from LGITMiK (course of Dmitry Astrakhan), at the same time being an actor of the Akimov Comedy Theater (St. Petersburg). In 1997-2010 he was an actor of the Moscow Drama Theater under the direction of A.B. Dzhigarkhanyan. Since 2010 - in the troupe of the Chekhov Moscow Art Theater. Songwriter and performer.
name: Aleksei Shevchenkov
